    On This Page

    Installation of pidgin on Ubuntu 12.04 or higher.

    Install the package by entering the following command on the terminal.

    sudo apt-get install pidgin

    Installation on other Operating systems.

    Follow the link below to pidgin’s official FAQ page which provides the information on installing pidgin on Windows and other Linux distributions.

    pidgin FAQ’s

    Registering an account on dukgo.com using pidgin.

    Follow the link below to dukgo’s official website, which demonstrates the process graphically.

    Account creation on dukgo.com
